item.description: Join Dance2Swing For Leominster, MA Downtown Multi Event Summer Stroll. We will be ROCKIN AND ROLLIN in front of the Mia Bellas Spa from June 25th from 1 to 5pm with DJ AlanHep2theJive Free Swingin Rock n Roll Dance Lesson ~ 1:30pm followed by social dancing and performances Brought to you by: Mia Bella Spa 12 Main St ~ Leominster MA. Multi Events, Classic Cars, Swing Dancing, Music, Live Bands, Parade, Face Painting, Food and more! Rain date 6/26/2011 Prize for best Rock n Roll Geek Last year 5000 people came

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group
